vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.5;
son of: Esau (H6215) and Oholibamah (H0173);
brother of: Jalam (H3281) and Korah (H7141);
half-brother of: Eliphaz (H0464) and Reuel (H7467)
Also named: ye.ish (יְעִישׁ "Jeush" H3274)
§ Jehush or Jeush = "He hurries to aid"
1) son of Eshek, a remote descendant of king Saul
2) a Gershonite Levite of the house of Shimei
3) son of king Rehoboam of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Esaú; (b)   hijo de Bilhán; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   hijo de Ésec; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   hijo de Simí; descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví; (e)   hijo de Roboam
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶烏施 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "他急忙去協助"
1) 掃羅王的遠親以設的兒子 (代上 8:39)
2) 示每家的革順族利未人(代上 23:10)
3) 猶大王羅波安的兒子(代下 11:19)
4) 以掃和他的妻子阿何利巴瑪所生的兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶乌施 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "他急忙去协助"
1) 扫罗王的远亲以设的儿子 (代上 8:39)
2) 示每家的革顺族利未人(代上 23:10)
3) 犹大王罗波安的儿子(代下 11:19)
4) 以扫和他的妻子阿何利巴玛所生的儿子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.10;
son of: Bilhan (H1092H);
brother of: Benjamin (H1144H), Ehud (H0164H), Chenaanah (H3668H), Zethan (H2133), Tarshish (H8659I) and Ahishahar (H0300)
§ Jehush or Jeush = "He hurries to aid"
1) son of Eshek, a remote descendant of king Saul
2) a Gershonite Levite of the house of Shimei
3) son of king Rehoboam of Judah

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.39;
son of: Eleasah (H0501H);
brother of: Ulam (H0198H) and Eliphelet (H0467J)
§ Jehush or Jeush = "He hurries to aid"
1) son of Eshek, a remote descendant of king Saul
2) a Gershonite Levite of the house of Shimei
3) son of king Rehoboam of Judah

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.10;
son of: Shimei (H8096);
brother of: Jahath (H3189I), Zina (H2126) and Beriah (H1283J)
§ Jehush or Jeush = "He hurries to aid"
1) son of Eshek, a remote descendant of king Saul
2) a Gershonite Levite of the house of Shimei
3) son of king Rehoboam of Judah

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.19;
son of: Rehoboam (H7346) and Mahalath (H4258H);
brother of: Shemariah (H8114H), Zaham (H2093);
half-brother of: Abijah (H0029I), Attai (H6262I), Ziza (H2124H) and Shelomith (H8019G)
§ Jehush or Jeush = "He hurries to aid"
1) son of Eshek, a remote descendant of king Saul
2) a Gershonite Levite of the house of Shimei
3) son of king Rehoboam of Judah
